questions.content: What is the cutest mistake you’ve ever seen someone make?
questions.author: Jill Frank
questions.notes: Maybe they moved here from another country, or misunderstood something in childhood that carried on to their life as an adult.

questions.content: What’s the best thing you have ever said in an interview?
questions.author: Anjali Peters
questions.notes: Was it off the cuff, or something planned?

questions.content: If you must use time travel to ruin the world as much as possible with only one kill. Who do you kill, and why?
questions.author: Patricia Arkan
questions.notes: You have one kill. Explain who you kill and why, if possible try to turn the world into an apocalyptic/post-apocalyptic one with your kill. Bonus points if the kill is pre-1900’s.
